lines.gurmukhi: AMqr AiCq hI idsMqir gvn krY pwCY pry phucY n pwieku jau DwveI
lines.transliteration_english: Antar Achhit Hee Disantari Gavan Karai , Paachhai Paray Pahouchai N Paaiku Jau Dhaavaee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Despite well hidden in the body, mind still reaches far off places. If someone tries to chase it, he just cannot reach it.

lines.gurmukhi: phucY n rQu phucY n gjrwju bwju phucY n Kg miRg PwNDq aufwveI
lines.transliteration_english: Pahouchai N Radu Pahouchai N Gajaraaju Baaju , Pahouchai N Khag Mrig Dhaandhat Udaavaee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: No chariot, a swift horse or even Airawat (a legendary elephant) can reach it. Neither a fast flying bird nor a galloping deer can match it.

lines.gurmukhi: phucY n pvn gvn qiRBvn pRiq ArD aurD AMqrIC huie n pwveI
lines.transliteration_english: Pahouchai N Pavan Gavan Tribhavan Prati , Aradh Uradh Antareechh Hui N Paavaee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Even the wind which has its reach in the three worlds cannot reach it. One who is capable of reaching the land of the world beyond, cannot win the race of mind.

lines.gurmukhi: pMc dUq BUq lig ADmu AswDu mnu ghy gur igAwn swDsMig bis AwveI ]313]
lines.transliteration_english: Panch Doot Bhoot Lagi Adhamu Asaadhu Manu , Gahay Gur Giaan Saadhasangi Basi Aavaee ?313?

Shabad OS B.translation: Inveigled by the five vices of maya that has embraced it like a demon, the low and incorrigible mind can only be controlled and disciplined if it accepts the initiation of the True Guru through the kind blessings of saintly and true devotees of the Lord.
